name: After School Fruit Rolls
author: Mission Foods
summary: In this twist on the classic peanut butter and banana sandwich, peanut butter is spread on flour tortillas, and then wrapped around a cinnamon and honey-sweetened mixture of bananas and raisins.
ingredients: 4  Mission® Soft Taco Size Flour Tortillas
¼ cup Chopped Peanuts or other Nuts  (Optional)
directions: Combine fruit, honey and cinnamon in a bowl
Spread each tortilla with 1 tablespoon peanut butter, leaving a 1-inch border
Spoon fruit filling down the center of each tortilla
Fold in 2 sides of tortilla to meet in center, then roll up, bottom to top
Halve each tortilla on a sharp diagonal
